relatedModules.summary: This module provides APIs for connecting and interacting with gRPC endpoints.

fields.name: console
fields.description: Boolean value to enable or disable console access logs

fields.name: path
fields.description: Optional file path to store access logs

records.name: AccessLogConfiguration
records.description: Represents gRPC access log configuration.

fields.name: token
fields.description: Bearer token for authentication

records.name: BearerTokenConfig
records.description: Represents token for Bearer token authentication.

fields.name: certFile
fields.description: A file containing the certificate

fields.name: keyFile
fields.description: A file containing the private key

fields.name: keyPassword
fields.description: Password of the private key if it is encrypted

records.name: CertKey
records.description: Represents combination of certificate, private key and private key password if encrypted.

fields.name: timeout
fields.description: The maximum time to wait(in seconds) for a response before closing the connection

fields.name: poolConfig
fields.description: Connection pool configuration

fields.name: secureSocket
fields.description: SSL/TLS related options

fields.name: compression
fields.description: Specifies the way of handling compression (`accept-encoding`) header

fields.name: retryConfiguration
fields.description: Configures the retry functionality

fields.name: auth
fields.description: Configurations related to client authentication

records.name: ClientConfiguration
records.description: Configurations for managing the gRPC client endpoint.

fields.name: enable
fields.description: Enable SSL validation

fields.name: cert
fields.description: Configurations associated with the `crypto:TrustStore` or a single certificate file that the client trusts

fields.name: key
fields.description: Configurations associated with `crypto:KeyStore` or combination of certificate and private key of the client

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: SSL/TLS protocol related options

fields.name: certValidation
fields.description: Certificate validation against OCSP_CRL, OCSP_STAPLING related options

fields.name: ciphers
fields.description:
List of ciphers to be used
eg: TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA

fields.name: verifyHostName
fields.description: Enable/disable host name verification

fields.name: shareSession
fields.description: Enable/disable new SSL session creation

fields.name: handshakeTimeout
fields.description: SSL handshake time out(in seconds)

fields.name: sessionTimeout
fields.description: SSL session time out(in seconds)

records.name: ClientSecureSocket
records.description: Configurations for facilitating secure communication with a remote gRPC endpoint.

memberTypes.name: issuer

memberTypes.name: username

memberTypes.name: customClaims

memberTypes.name: expTime
memberTypes.description: Expiry time in seconds

memberTypes.name: signatureConfig

records.name: JwtIssuerConfig
records.description: Represents JWT issuer configurations for JWT authentication.

memberTypes.name: issuer
memberTypes.description: Expected issuer, which is mapped to the `iss`

memberTypes.name: username
memberTypes.description: Expected username, which is mapped to the `sub`

memberTypes.name: audience
memberTypes.description: Expected audience, which is mapped to the `aud`

memberTypes.name: jwtId

memberTypes.name: keyId
memberTypes.description: Expected JWT key ID, which is mapped the `kid`

memberTypes.name: customClaims
memberTypes.description: Expected map of custom claims

memberTypes.name: clockSkew
memberTypes.description: Clock skew (in seconds) that can be used to avoid token validation failures due to clock synchronization problems

memberTypes.name: signatureConfig
memberTypes.description: JWT signature configurations

memberTypes.name: cacheConfig
memberTypes.description: Configurations related to the cache, which are used to store parsed JWT information

fields.name: scopeKey
fields.description: The key used to fetch the scopes

fields.description: JWT validator configurations for JWT authentication

inclusionType.name: LdapUserStoreConfig
inclusionType.description: Represents the LDAP user store configurations.

memberTypes.name: domainName
memberTypes.description: Unique name to identify the user store

memberTypes.name: connectionUrl
memberTypes.description: Connection URL of the LDAP server

memberTypes.name: connectionName
memberTypes.description: The username used to connect to the LDAP server

memberTypes.name: connectionPassword
memberTypes.description: The password used to connect to the LDAP server

memberTypes.name: userSearchBase
memberTypes.description: DN of the context or object under which the user entries are stored in the LDAP server

memberTypes.name: userEntryObjectClass
memberTypes.description: Object class used to construct user entries

memberTypes.name: userNameAttribute
memberTypes.description: The attribute used for uniquely identifying a user entry

memberTypes.name: userNameSearchFilter
memberTypes.description: Filtering criteria used to search for a particular user entry

memberTypes.name: userNameListFilter
memberTypes.description: Filtering criteria for searching user entries in the LDAP server

memberTypes.name: groupSearchBase
memberTypes.description: DN of the context or object under which the group entries are stored in the LDAP server

memberTypes.name: groupEntryObjectClass
memberTypes.description: Object class used to construct group entries

memberTypes.name: groupNameAttribute
memberTypes.description: The attribute used for uniquely identifying a group entry

memberTypes.name: groupNameSearchFilter
memberTypes.description: Filtering criteria used to search for a particular group entry

memberTypes.name: groupNameListFilter
memberTypes.description: Filtering criteria for searching group entries in the LDAP server

memberTypes.name: membershipAttribute
memberTypes.description: Define the attribute, which contains the distinguished names (DN) of user objects that are there in a group

memberTypes.name: userRolesCacheEnabled
memberTypes.description: To indicate whether to cache the role list of a user

memberTypes.name: connectionPoolingEnabled
memberTypes.description: Define whether LDAP connection pooling is enabled

memberTypes.name: connectionTimeout
memberTypes.description: Connection timeout (in seconds) when making the initial LDAP connection

memberTypes.name: readTimeout
memberTypes.description: Reading timeout (in seconds) for LDAP operations

memberTypes.name: secureSocket
memberTypes.description: The SSL configurations for the LDAP client socket. This needs to be configured in order to communicate through LDAPs

fields.name: timeout
fields.description:
Period of time in seconds that a connection waits for a read/write operation. Use value 0 to
disable the timeout

fields.name: protocol

fields.name: ciphers

List of ciphers to be used
eg: TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA

inclusionType.name: ClientCredentialsGrantConfig
inclusionType.description: Represents the data structure, which is used to configure the OAuth2 client credentials grant type.

memberTypes.name: tokenUrl
memberTypes.description: Token URL of the token endpoint

memberTypes.name: clientId
memberTypes.description: Client ID of the client authentication

memberTypes.name: clientSecret
memberTypes.description: Client secret of the client authentication

memberTypes.name: scopes
memberTypes.description: Scope(s) of the access request

memberTypes.name: defaultTokenExpTime
memberTypes.description: Expiration time (in seconds) of the tokens if the token endpoint response does not contain an `expires_in` field

memberTypes.name: clockSkew
memberTypes.description: Clock skew (in seconds) that can be used to avoid token validation failures due to clock synchronization problems

memberTypes.name: optionalParams
memberTypes.description: Map of the optional parameters used for the token endpoint

memberTypes.name: credentialBearer
memberTypes.description: Bearer of the authentication credentials, which is sent to the token endpoint

memberTypes.name: clientConfig
memberTypes.description: HTTP client configurations, which are used to call the token endpoint

memberTypes.description: Configurations for the cache used to store the OAuth2 access token and other related information

memberTypes.name: defaultTokenExpTime
memberTypes.description: Expiration time (in seconds) of the tokens if the introspection response does not contain an `exp` field

memberTypes.name: clientConfig
memberTypes.description: HTTP client configurations, which call the introspection endpoint

fields.name: maxActiveConnections
fields.description: Max active connections per route(host:port). The default value is -1, which indicates unlimited

fields.name: maxIdleConnections
fields.description: Maximum number of idle connections allowed per pool

fields.name: waitTime
fields.description: Maximum amount of time the client should wait for an idle connection before it sends an error when the pool is exhausted

fields.name: maxActiveStreamsPerConnection
fields.description: Maximum active streams per connection. This only applies to HTTP/2

records.name: PoolConfiguration
records.description: Configurations for managing the gRPC client connection pool.

fields.name: host
fields.description: The remote host name/IP

fields.name: port
fields.description: The remote port

records.name: Remote
records.description: Presents a read-only view of the remote address.

fields.name: retryCount
fields.description: Maximum number of retry attempts in a failure scenario

fields.name: interval
fields.description: Initial interval(in seconds) between the retry attempts

fields.name: maxInterval
fields.description: Maximum interval(in seconds) between two retry attempts

fields.name: backoffFactor
fields.description: Retry interval will be multiplied by this factor, in between retry attempts

fields.name: errorTypes
fields.description: Error types which should be considered as failure scenarios to retry

records.name: RetryConfiguration
records.description: Configurations for facilitating the retry capability of the gRPC client.

fields.name: descriptor
fields.description: Service descriptor, which should be set at the compile time

fields.name: descMap
fields.description: Service-dependent descriptor map, which should be set at the compile time

records.name: ServiceDescriptorData
records.description: Service descriptor data generated at the compile time.

fields.name: console
fields.description: Boolean value to enable or disable console trace logs

fields.name: path
fields.description: Optional file path to store trace logs

fields.name: host
fields.description: Optional socket hostname to publish the trace logs

fields.name: port
fields.description: Optional socket port to publish the trace logs

records.name: TraceLogAdvancedConfiguration
records.description: Represents gRPC trace log configuration.

objectTypes.name: AbstractClientEndpoint
objectTypes.description: Represents the abstract gRPC client endpoint. This abstract object is used in the generated client.

returnParameters.description: - A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: send
remoteMethods.description:
Sends the outbound response to the caller.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? err = caller->send(message);
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: complete
remoteMethods.description:
Informs the caller, when the server has sent all the messages.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = caller->complete();
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: sendError
remoteMethods.description:
Sends a server error to the caller.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = caller->sendError(error grpc:AbortedError("Operation aborted"));
```

fields.name: remoteDetails
fields.description: The remote details

fields.name: local
fields.description: The local details

returnParameters.description: caller ID

methods.name: getId
methods.description:
Returns the unique identification of the caller.
```ballerina
int result = caller.getId();
```

returnParameters.description: - A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

methods.name: send
methods.description:
Sends the outbound response to the caller.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? err = caller->send(message);
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

methods.name: complete
methods.description:
Informs the caller, when the server has sent all the messages.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = caller->complete();
```

returnParameters.description: True if the caller has already closed the connection or else false

methods.name: isCancelled
methods.description:
Checks whether the connection is closed by the caller.
```ballerina
boolean result = caller.isCancelled();
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

methods.name: sendError
methods.description:
Sends a server error to the caller.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = caller->sendError(error grpc:AbortedError("Operation aborted"));
```

returnParameters.description: caller ID

otherMethods.name: getId
otherMethods.description:
Returns the unique identification of the caller.
```ballerina
int result = caller.getId();
```

returnParameters.description: True if the caller has already closed the connection or else false

otherMethods.name: isCancelled
otherMethods.description:
Checks whether the connection is closed by the caller.
```ballerina
boolean result = caller.isCancelled();
```

clients.name: Caller
clients.description: The base client used in the generated client code to provide remote functions for interacting with the caller.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Request message. The message type varies with the remote service method parameter

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: The response as an `anydata` type value or else a `grpc:Error`

remoteMethods.name: executeSimpleRPC
remoteMethods.description:
Calls when executing a unary gRPC service.
```ballerina
[anydata, map<string|string[]>]|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeSimpleRPC("HelloWorld/hello", req, headers);
```

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Request message. The message type varies with the remote service method parameter

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: A `stream<anydata, grpc:Error?>` or a `grpc:Error` when an error occurs while sending the request

remoteMethods.name: executeServerStreaming
remoteMethods.description:
Calls when executing a server streaming call with a gRPC service.
```ballerina
[stream<anydata, grpc:Error?>, map<string|string[]>]|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeServerStreaming("HelloWorld/hello", req, headers);
```

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:StreamingClient` object or a `grpc:Error` when an error occurs

remoteMethods.name: executeClientStreaming
remoteMethods.description:
Calls when executing a client streaming call with a gRPC service.
```ballerina
grpc:StreamingClient|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeClientStreaming("HelloWorld/hello", headers);
```

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:StreamingClient` object or a `grpc:Error` when an error occurs

remoteMethods.name: executeBidirectionalStreaming
remoteMethods.description:
Calls when executing a bi-directional streaming call with a gRPC service.
```ballerina
grpc:StreamingClient|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeBidirectionalStreaming("HelloWorld/hello", headers);
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while initializing the client or else `()`

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Gets invoked to initialize the endpoint. During the initialization, the configurations provided through the `config`
record are used for the endpoint initialization.
```ballerina
HelloWorldClient helloWorldClient = check new("http://localhost:9091");
```

parameters.name: descriptorMap
parameters.description: Proto descriptor map with all the dependent descriptors

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while initializing the stub or else `()`

methods.name: initStub
methods.description:
Calls when initializing the client endpoint with the service descriptor data extracted from the proto file.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = grpcClient.initStub(self, ROOT_DESCRIPTOR, getDescriptorMap());
```

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Request message. The message type varies with the remote service method parameter

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: The response as an `anydata` type value or else a `grpc:Error`

methods.name: executeSimpleRPC
methods.description:
Calls when executing a unary gRPC service.
```ballerina
[anydata, map<string|string[]>]|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeSimpleRPC("HelloWorld/hello", req, headers);
```

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Request message. The message type varies with the remote service method parameter

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: A `stream<anydata, grpc:Error?>` or a `grpc:Error` when an error occurs while sending the request

methods.name: executeServerStreaming
methods.description:
Calls when executing a server streaming call with a gRPC service.
```ballerina
[stream<anydata, grpc:Error?>, map<string|string[]>]|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeServerStreaming("HelloWorld/hello", req, headers);
```

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:StreamingClient` object or a `grpc:Error` when an error occurs

methods.name: executeClientStreaming
methods.description:
Calls when executing a client streaming call with a gRPC service.
```ballerina
grpc:StreamingClient|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeClientStreaming("HelloWorld/hello", headers);
```

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Optional headers parameter. The header value are passed only if needed. The default value is `()`

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:StreamingClient` object or a `grpc:Error` when an error occurs

methods.name: executeBidirectionalStreaming
methods.description:
Calls when executing a bi-directional streaming call with a gRPC service.
```ballerina
grpc:StreamingClient|grpc:Error result = grpcClient->executeBidirectionalStreaming("HelloWorld/hello", headers);
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while initializing the client or else `()`

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Gets invoked to initialize the endpoint. During the initialization, the configurations provided through the `config`
record are used for the endpoint initialization.
```ballerina
HelloWorldClient helloWorldClient = check new("http://localhost:9091");
```

parameters.name: descriptorMap
parameters.description: Proto descriptor map with all the dependent descriptors

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while initializing the stub or else `()`

otherMethods.name: initStub
otherMethods.description:
Calls when initializing the client endpoint with the service descriptor data extracted from the proto file.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = grpcClient.initStub(self, ROOT_DESCRIPTOR, getDescriptorMap());
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: send
remoteMethods.description:
Sends the request message to the server.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? err = sClient->send(message);
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: complete
remoteMethods.description:
Informs the server when the caller has sent all the messages.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = sClient->complete();
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: sendError
remoteMethods.description:
Sends an error message to the server.
```ballerina
grpc:Error? result = sClient->sendError(error grpc:AbortedError("Operation aborted"));
```

returnParameters.description: An `anydata` value

remoteMethods.name: receive
remoteMethods.description:
Receives server responses in client streaming and bidirectional streaming.
```ballerina
anydata|grpc:Error? result = streamingClient->receive();
```

returnParameters.description: A `grpc:Error` if an error occurs while sending the response or else `()`

clients.name: StreamingClient
clients.description:
The base client used in the generated client code to provide the gRPC streaming client actions for
interacting  with the gRPC server.

parameters.name: grpcService
parameters.description: The type of the service to be registered

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurs while attaching the service or else `()`

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description:
Gets called every time a service attaches itself to this endpoint - also happens at module init time.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.attach(helloService);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurs while starting the server or else `()`

methods.name: 'start
methods.description:
Starts the registered service.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.'start();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stopping process or else `()`

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description:
Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.gracefulStop();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurs while stopping the server or else `()`

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description:
Stops the registered service.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.immediateStop();
```

parameters.name: grpcService
parameters.description: The type of the service to be registered

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurs while attaching the service or else `()`

methods.name: attach
methods.description:
Gets called every time a service attaches itself to this endpoint - also happens at module init time.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.attach(helloService);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the detaching of the service or else `()`

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Detaches an HTTP or WebSocket service from the listener. Note that detaching a WebSocket service would not affect
the functionality of the existing connections.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.detach(helloService);
```

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Gets called when the endpoint is being initialized during the module init time.
```ballerina
listener grpc:Listener listenerEp = new (9092);
```

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Gets called when the endpoint is being initialized during the module init time.
```ballerina
listener grpc:Listener listenerEp = new (9092);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurs while starting the server or else `()`

otherMethods.name: 'start
otherMethods.description:
Starts the registered service.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.'start();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stopping process or else `()`

otherMethods.name: gracefulStop
otherMethods.description:
Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.gracefulStop();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurs while stopping the server or else `()`

otherMethods.name: immediateStop
otherMethods.description:
Stops the registered service.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.immediateStop();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the detaching of the service or else `()`

otherMethods.name: detach
otherMethods.description:
Detaches an HTTP or WebSocket service from the listener. Note that detaching a WebSocket service would not affect
the functionality of the existing connections.
```ballerina
error? result = listenerEp.detach(helloService);
```

listeners.name: Listener
listeners.description:
The server listener of which one or more services can be registered so that the Ballerina program can offer
a service through this listener.

parameters.name: serviceRef
parameters.description: The service reference where the resource locates

functions.name: authenticateResource
functions.description:
Uses for declarative auth design, where the authentication/authorization decision is taken
by reading the auth annotations provided in service/resource and the `Authorization` header of request.

parameters.name: headerMap
parameters.description: Optional header map sent by the client

returnParameters.description: `deadline` value when the deadline is correctly specified, `()` when the deadline is not specified, or else a `time:Error` when a `deadline`-parsing error occurred

functions.name: getDeadline
functions.description:
Returns the deadline value as `time:Utc`. This can be used to get the deadline and propagate it to subsequent internal calls.
```ballerina
time:Utc?|time:Error deadline = grpc:getDeadline(map<string|string[]> headerMap);
```

returnParameters.description: First header value if exists or else error

functions.name: getHeader

returnParameters.description: Header value array

functions.name: getHeaders

parameters.name: headerMap
parameters.description: Optional header map sent by the client

returnParameters.description: `true` when the deadline is exceeded, `false` when the deadline is not exceeded, or else a `time:Error` when a `deadline`-parsing error occurred

functions.name: isCancelled
functions.description:
Checks whether the deadline is already exceeded or not.
```ballerina
boolean|time:Error isCancelled = grpc:isCancelled(map<string|string[]> headerMap);
```

parameters.name: headerMap
parameters.description: Optional header map (if this is not specified, it creates a new header set)

returnParameters.description: The header map that includes the compression headers

functions.name: setCompression
functions.description:
Enables the compression support by adding the `grpc-encoding` header to the given headers.
```ballerina
map<string|string[]> headers = grpc:setCompression(grpc:GZIP);
```

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: The deadline time value (this should be a specific time and not a duration)

parameters.name: headerMap
parameters.description: Optional header map (if this is not specified, it creates a new header set)

returnParameters.description: The header map that includes the deadline

functions.name: setDeadline

constants.name: AUTH_SCHEME_BASIC
constants.description: The prefix used to denote the Basic authentication scheme.

constants.name: AUTH_SCHEME_BEARER
constants.description: The prefix used to denote the Bearer authentication scheme.

constants.name: COMPRESSION_ALWAYS
constants.description: Always set accept-encoding/content-encoding in outbound request/response.

constants.name: COMPRESSION_AUTO
constants.description:
When service behaves as a HTTP gateway inbound request/response accept-encoding option is set as the
outbound request/response accept-encoding/content-encoding option.

constants.name: COMPRESSION_NEVER
constants.description: Never set accept-encoding/content-encoding header in outbound request/response.

annotations.name: ServiceConfig
annotations.description: The annotation which is used to configure a gRPC service.

errors.name: AbortedError
errors.description: Represents error occur when operation is aborted.

errors.name: AllRetryAttemptsFailed
errors.description: Represents error scenario where the maximum retry attempts are done and still received an error.

errors.name: AlreadyExistsError
errors.description: Represents error occur when attempt to create an entity which already exists.

errors.name: CancelledError
errors.description: Represents the operation canceled(typically by the caller) error.

errors.name: ClientAuthError
errors.description: Represents an error when client authentication error occured.

errors.name: DataLossError
errors.description: Represents unrecoverable data loss or corruption erros.

errors.name: DataMismatchError
errors.description: Represents an error when expected data type is not available.

errors.name: DeadlineExceededError
errors.description: Represents operation expired before completion error.

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Represents gRPC related errors.

errors.name: FailedPreconditionError
errors.description: Represents error occur when operation is rejected because the system is not in a state required for the operation's execution.

errors.name: InternalError
errors.description: Represents internal error.

errors.name: InvalidArgumentError
errors.description: Represents client specified an invalid argument error.

errors.name: NotFoundError
errors.description: Represents requested entity (e.g., file or directory) not found error.

errors.name: OutOfRangeError
errors.description: Represents error occur when specified value is out of range.

errors.name: PermissionDeniedError
errors.description: Represents error occur when the caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

errors.name: ResiliencyError
errors.description: Represents all the resiliency-related errors.

errors.name: ResourceExhaustedError
errors.description: Represents error occur when the resource is exhausted.

errors.name: StreamClosedError
errors.description: Represents an error when calling next when the stream has closed.

errors.name: UnauthenticatedError
errors.description: Represents error occur when the request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

errors.name: UnavailableError
errors.description: Represents error occur when the service is currently unavailable.

errors.name: UnimplementedError
errors.description: Represents error occur when operation is not implemented or not supported/enabled in this service.

errors.name: UnKnownError
errors.description: Represents unknown error(e.g., Status value received is unknown).

types.name: ClientAuthConfig
types.description: Defines the authentication configurations for the HTTP client.

types.name: Compression
types.description:
Represents compression options.

`AUTO`: When the service behaves as a HTTP gateway, the inbound request/response accept-encoding option is set as the
outbound request/response accept-encoding/content-encoding option
`ALWAYS`: Always set accept-encoding/content-encoding in outbound request/response
`NEVER`: Never set accept-encoding/content-encoding header in outbound request/response

types.name: ListenerAuthConfig
types.description: Defines the authentication configurations for the gRPC listener.

types.name: OAuth2GrantConfig
types.description: Represents OAuth2 grant configurations for OAuth2 authentication.

enums.name: CompressionType
enums.description:
Compression types that are supported.
GZIP - Gzip compression

modules.summary: This module provides APIs for connecting and interacting with gRPC endpoints.

modules.description: This module provides APIs for connecting and interacting with gRPC endpoints.

classes.description: Defines the Basic Auth handler for client authentication.
Defines the Bearer token auth handler for client authentication.
Defines the self signed JWT handler for client authentication.
Defines the file store Basic Auth handler for listener authentication.
Defines the JWT auth handler for listener authentication.

functions.description:
Uses for declarative auth design, where the authentication/authorization decision is taken
by reading the auth annotations provided in service/resource and the `Authorization` header of request.

Returns the deadline value as `time:Utc`. This can be used to get the deadline and propagate it to subsequent internal calls.
```ballerina
time:Utc?|time:Error deadline = grpc:getDeadline(map<string|string[]> headerMap);
```

Checks whether the deadline is already exceeded or not.
```ballerina
boolean|time:Error isCancelled = grpc:isCancelled(map<string|string[]> headerMap);
```

Enables the compression support by adding the `grpc-encoding` header to the given headers.
```ballerina
map<string|string[]> headers = grpc:setCompression(grpc:GZIP);
```
